choices.text:
{
  "name": "Pelmeny",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 lb ground beef",
    "1/2 cup onion, finely chopped",
    "1/2 cup cooked rice",
    "1 egg",
    "1/2 teaspoon salt",
    "1/4 teaspoon pepper",
    "1/4 teaspoon garlic powder"
  ],
  "instructions": [
    "In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, onion, cooked rice, egg, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.",
    "Mix together until all ingredients are evenly distributed.",
    "Form the mixture into small balls, about 1 inch in diameter.",
    "Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.",
    "Drop the pelmeny into the boiling water and cook for 10 minutes.",
    "Remove the pelmeny from the water and serve hot."
  ]
}
